subject: Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Petter Northug and Marit Bjorgen gave Norway a perfect start to the Nordic skiing world championships in Falun, Sweden, by winning the men’s and women’s cross-country sprints.
snippet: Petter Northug and Marit Bjorgen gave Norway a perfect start to the Nordic skiing world championships in Falun, Sweden, by winning the men’s and women’s cross-country sprints.
